definition: associated with or performed by members of the armed services as contrasted with civilians, the military forces of a nation
details:
adjective
- associated with or performed by members of the armed services as contrasted with civilians
= example: associated with or performed by members of the armed services as contrasted with civilians
- characteristic of or associated with soldiers or the military
= example: characteristic of or associated with soldiers or the military
- of or relating to the study of the principles of warfare
= example: of or relating to the study of the principles of warfare
noun
- the military forces of a nation
= example: the military forces of a nation
= synonyms: armed forces, armed services, military machine, war machine
